title: Radical Index
text: What is the index of the radical?

title: Even radical index
text: Since the radical index is 2, it is even, so, the radicand must be greater than or equal to 0.

title: Solving the Radicand
text: We need $$\frac{5}{x-2} \geq 0$$. The denominator can not be zero. Since the numerator is positive and we only need to ensure the denominator is positive. Solve $$x-2>0$$.

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Add 2 to both sides of the inequality and get $$x>2$$.

title: Find the domain
text: We can turn $$x>2$$ into interval notation as $$(2,\infty)$$.
